entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
